document_data.mainbody:
emmerem was a laborer inhabiting the city of Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He discovered that slaves were being secretly transported with a caravan while he was working a job for the Piiradost clan. For his discretion regarding the matter, the Piiradost bribed Hemmerem and was provided work with the familys horse-breeding business.
